website.title: Crocus
website.tips: Here you can search for what you want to know
website.storyInfo: which can be scary or heartwarming, all from real life, with names as nicknames. if you're one of them, hopefully we won't offend you. Bad history is sobering, good stories are warm others.
website.questions: Some one will ask questions on this site, and when they choose to make the question public, it may appear there. Of course, there are also questions prepared by the website operator, I hope you find them helpful !
website.questionLeft: You can get more information that you want to know,
website.bookArticle: There are some books and articles that can be referred to here, which come from the Internet and are not available for download, filtering out those with personal prejudice, racial discrimination and sexism. Only a considerable, referable part is retained.
